mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT('amon-', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '-', IFNULL(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(approval_id, '-', -1) AS UNSIGNED)) + 1, 1)) AS approval_id FROM approval_request WHERE approval_id LIKE CONCAT('amon-', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '-%')

SELECT doc_id , approval_id , draft_date , department , drafter , approval_title , approval_content , instructions , remark , created_id , created_date , updated_id , updated_date FROM approval_request WHERE doc_id = #{docId}

SELECT doc_id , transport_expense_id , expense_date , vehicle_start , vehicle_end , vehicle_purpose , visit_description , expense_amount , remark , created_id , created_date , updated_id , updated_date FROM transport_expense_detail WHERE doc_id = #{docId}
